overview:
In 2005, Nick Matina, Founder and serial entrepreneur, set out to develop ChatStat (http://www.chatstat.com) as his third (3rd) business venture, because he saw a gap in the market for Live Interaction technologies for the small to medium size business owners.

Matina previously created and founded Price.com, one of the first comparison engines on the market and still a top rated tool for on-line shoppers looking for a bargin.

After Price.com, Matina founded and launched Monstercommerce.com where he created a shopping cart engine using a new â€˜floating cart’ paradigm that has become the standard for all shopping cart applications used by on-line stores around the globe.

Matina’s vision for ChatStat is a Live Interaction solution for website owners that is:

* the easiest to implement and use;
* Able to combine multiple capabilities and technologies in a revolutionary approach;
* an Open architecture that enables best of breed integration

But, most importantly that “it just works.” This means that a business owner understands the value of the product and can use the product immediately.
